all.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'event'){ emit([doc._id], doc); } else if (doc.type == 'voter') { emit([doc._id], doc); } else if (doc.type == 'vote') { emit([doc.event_id, doc.vote, doc._id], doc); } }

byPhonenumber.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'event') { emit(doc.phonenumber, {_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }

voterByPhonenumber.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'voter') { emit(doc.phonenumber, {_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }

currentShow.map: function (doc) { if (doc.type == 'show') { emit(doc.current, {_id: doc._id, state: doc.state}) } }
